message:
1. Hidden Risks of Amazon S3 Misconfigurations: [https://blog.qualys.com/vulnerabilities-threat-research/2023/12/18/hidden-risks-of-amazon-s3-misconfigurations](https://blog.qualys.com/vulnerabilities-threat-research/2023/12/18/hidden-risks-of-amazon-s3-misconfigurations)
2. Amazon S3 Security and Access Management Best Practices: [https://pages.awscloud.com/Amazon-S3-security-and-access-management-best-practices_2022_0615-STG_OD.html](https://pages.awscloud.com/Amazon-S3-security-and-access-management-best-practices_2022_0615-STG_OD.html)
3. Amazon S3 Security: [https://aws.amazon.com/s3/security/](https://aws.amazon.com/s3/security/)
4. Heads-Up: Amazon S3 Security Changes Are Coming in April of 2023: [https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/aws/heads-up-amazon-s3-security-changes-are-coming-in-april-of-2023/](https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/aws/heads-up-amazon-s3-security-changes-are-coming-in-april-of-2023/)
5. Amazon S3 User Guide - Security Best Practices: [https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/userguide/security-best-practices.html](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/userguide/security-best-practices.html)

TOTAL_PAGES:5

**Task**
- List 10 AWS webpages that contain security recommendations for Amazon S3

**Instructions***
- Return only the name of the pages and the URL for immediate access following the format PAGE_NAME:URL_FOR_DIRECT_ACCESS
- After listing all the pages, skip 2 lines and report the total number of pages listed following the model below:

TOTAL_PAGES:NUMBER_OF_PAGES_LISTED
